Title: Gymnasium Light Fixture Out
Description: Three light fixtures not working in gymnasium. Inadequate lighting for sports activities and assemblies.

Title: Parking Lot Pothole Repair
Description: Large pothole in staff parking lot near main entrance. Risk of vehicle damage. Approximately 2 feet wide.

Title: HVAC Not Working in Room 203
Description: Air conditioning unit not blowing cold air. Room temperature reaching 80+ degrees. Affects student comfort.

Title: Broken Ceiling Tile in Hallway
Description: Ceiling tile fallen in main hallway near gymnasium. Creating safety hazard for students and staff.

Title: Leaky Faucet in Teacher's Lounge
Description: Kitchen faucet in teacher's lounge has steady drip. Water pooling on counter. Need plumbing repair.
